replies.body:
Here in lies the problem.

It's not a copy.

Now yes, it holds the same style as a lot of games, but that is the problem, it looks like a lot of games, not just league.

And let's face it, if Riot tried that, they would open themselves up for things against them (think about how many skins are realistically just straight ripoff's of other games/movies and such.)

Even though China has a way around the copyright law, I have to completely disagree. Riot has not "ripped off" any company. They won't because it can get them in trouble. They may have made references in skins, but to say that Riot has "ripped off", especially to the level that you can obviously see in the ad, is just stupid.

Using the name Taric is ripping them off to a point where an obviously ripped off skin isn't?

Because outside of that, arguing that the side bars/Power bars/Skills setup is ripping off league is a stretch, as they are from various other games.

I don't see what you are trying to say? When did I say side bars/power bars/skills setup is taking off of League of Legends? I am saying that the exact client design and the characters are directly ripped off. These are different levels here.

yeah see how it says number 2.
Number 1 copied WoW, Dota, HoN, and League.

I've seen this and still wondering how it keeps coming up.

The problem with copyright is that only a few countries actually have the law, for example.
China actually has none, and as such there are so many games that look like League/Dota.
And nothing can be done. There are even Chinese YouTube channels, where they copy other videos and just put Chinese subtitles on.
(Sp4zie is an example of this) He just thinks its funny, It would piss me off if someone took my work and just slapped text on it.

That was a bot off topic sorry.
